    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(java.lang.String name,
             int level,
             java.util.List<Item> lootTable)
        Constructor of Enemy class. This is the constructor of the Enemy class. It set's the loot table of the enemy and calls Fightable's constructor (it's super class).
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the enemy being created.
        level - Level of the enemy being created.
        lootTable - Loot table of the enemy being created.

    • Method Detail

      • getExperienceYield

        public java.lang.Integer getExperienceYield()

      • getLootTable

        public java.util.List<Item> getLootTable()
        Get loot table. This method returns the loot table from an enemy.
        Returns:
        Returns a read-only list containing the enemy's loot table. It should only be used to check items dropped from the enemy.

      • lootItem

        public Item lootItem(Item item)
        Loot item. This method should be used to loot an item from a dead enemy. It checks if the enemy is alive, if not, checks if the enemy actually have the item and if so, returns it. Returns null if the enemy is alive or doesn't have the item.
        Parameters:
        item -
        Returns:

      • attack

        public int attack()
        Attack. Returns an int corresponding to the damage from a basic attack of an Enemy.
        Specified by:
        attack in class Fightable
        Returns:
